channel.title: Drop and other help plz
channel.description:
Ok 3 questions......
1. Can sum1 please tell me EVERYTHING I need to add to get a drop to work? (npcdrops.cfg, item2.java ect) I keep trying and failing with drops..
2. How do you know what zoom to use with models added by using a model grabber? I want to add elite and dagonhai but dont know zoom.
3. I used the IP ban thingy in server.java where it automaticlly IP bans ppl if they give more then 1 connection. However, sumtime ppls client lagg them out but they are still logged in. They hit log in again and it says "You acc is already logged in". It counts that as a connection and they get IP banned. So i removed the auto IPBan. Now I get many SYI ppl.. Please help!

item.title: Drop and other help plz
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

  1. no… it always happens to all ppl.

  2. I know that… i mean what code do you need to add to client.java and item2.java
    only adding it to npcdrops.cfg doesnt do anything… (im programming from scratch)

Read full topic

item.title: Drop and other help plz
item.dc:creator: @_Ryan3 _Ryan
item.description:
@_Ryan3 wrote:

npcdrops.cfg for drops first number is NPCID next is ITEMID next is ammount and the final is how often its dropped up to 100

  1. How do you expect us to help you obviously fucked up lol.

Read full topic
